content: Please specify Login user who has LDAP server read access rights.

comment.text: This translation key is used as a tooltip to inform users about the requirements for authenticating via LDAP. It appears in an input field within an authentication container, prompting users to specify a login user with read access rights to the LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "يرجى تحديد دخول للمستخدم الذي لديه حقوق الوصول لقراءة دليل LDAP" is not an accurate translation of "Please specify Login user who has LDAP server read access rights." The word 'دخول' (dukhool) means 'entry' or 'login' and is redundant. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of specifying a user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يرجى تحديد المستخدم الذي لديه صلاحية قراءة دليل LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لديه حقوق الوصول لقراءة" can be improved for better flow and naturalness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لديه صلاحية قراءة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing could be more concise and direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يرجى تحديد المستخدم المصرح له بقراءة دليل LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Giriş istifadəçisini' is a literal translation of 'Login user'. A more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani would be something like 'LDAP server oxumaq hüququna malik istifadəçi' or 'LDAP server oxumaq hüquqları olan istifadəçi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfən, LDAP server oxumaq hüququna malik istifadəçi göstərin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not entirely accurate. While understandable, 'Молим да посочите потребител за влизане' is a bit verbose. A more natural phrasing would be 'Моля, посочете потребител...', or even 'Посочете потребител...', depending on the desired level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Посочете потребител...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'четене' (reading) is technically correct, but 'достъп' (access) might be a more precise translation of 'access rights' in this context, reflecting the technical nature of the instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Моля, посочете потребител, който има права за достъп до LDAP сървър.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Zadejte prosím Přihlášení uživatele, který má práva ke čtení serveru LDAP." is not an accurate translation of "Please specify Login user who has LDAP server read access rights." The phrase 'Přihlášení uživatele' is too literal and clunky. It doesn't convey the intended meaning effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte uživatelské jméno pro přihlášení, které má práva pro čtení z LDAP serveru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the direct translation feels unnatural and lacks the fluidity of idiomatic Czech. The phrase "ke čtení serveru LDAP" is also slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence for better readability in Czech. For example, 'Uveďte uživatelské jméno pro přihlášení s právy ke čtení z LDAP serveru.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Καθορίστε τον χρήστη Σύνδεσης...' is not the most natural or accurate way to convey the meaning of 'Please specify Login user...'. 'Login user' implies a specific user involved in the login process, which might be better conveyed with a more explicit term like 'τον χρήστη που χρησιμοποιεί για σύνδεση' (the user who uses for login) or 'τον χρήστη που κάνει σύνδεση' (the user who is logging in).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Καθορίστε τον χρήστη που κάνει σύνδεση...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'δικαιώματα πρόσβασης ανάγνωσης' could be simplified for better readability. It's a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: δικαιώματα ανάγνωσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ole hyvä ja määrittele Käyttäjätunnus, jolla on LDAP-palvelimen lukuoikeudet' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Finnish. The phrasing 'Please specify Login user' is directly translated, which isn't standard practice. 'Login user' is not a common Finnish term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Määrittele käyttäjätunnus, jolla on LDAP-palvelimen lukuoikeudet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically not incorrect, the translation doesn't include a direct equivalent of 'Tooltip'. This might be implied in context but including something like 'Ilmoitus:', 'Vihje:' would be more explicit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ilmoitus: Määrittele käyttäjätunnus, jolla on LDAP-palvelimen lukuoikeudet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Veuillez spécifier le login de l'utilisateur qui a les droits d'accès en lecture au serveur LDAP' is a bit verbose and could be improved for clarity and conciseness. 'Login' is somewhat redundant as 'utilisateur' already implies a user account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Veuillez spécifier l'utilisateur disposant des droits de lecture sur le serveur LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the translation maintains the English phrasing, 'Login'. It's more natural in French to use a more direct translation or implied meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'Login' with 'nom d'utilisateur' or simply omitting it and using 'l'utilisateur'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Armenian. 'Please specify Login user' is awkward. It would be better to convey the meaning of 'specify the user account used for LDAP login'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք նշել օգտատերերի հաշվեկանոն, որն օգտագործվում է LDAP մուտքի համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'ունի LDAP սերվեր կարդալու մուտքի իրավունքներ' (has LDAP server read access rights) is cumbersome. It's more common to say 'ունի լրատվական մուտքի իրավունքներ' (has read access rights).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ունի լրատվական մուտքի իրավունքներ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the English term 'Login user' in parentheses. This is unnecessary and disrupts the flow of the Italian sentence. It's better to simply use a more natural Italian equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Specificare l'utente con i diritti di accesso in lettura al server LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around 'Login user' is visually jarring in Italian.  It's generally not standard practice in this type of phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the parentheses around 'Login user'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but slightly awkward and doesn't fully capture the nuance of the English. 'Login user' is a bit clunky in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ' meaning 'user who logs in'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາລະบุຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບທີ່ມີສິດອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຊີບເວີ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but sounds awkward and overly formal for a tooltip. "Norādiet pieteikšanās lietotāju" is verbose. A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Norādiet LDAP lietotāju ar lasīšanas tiesībām.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses the singular 'user'. While the Latvian technically translates the plural, it could be improved to match the singular aspect of the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Norādiet LDAP lietotāju ar lasīšanas tiesībām.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Geef een Login gebruiker op die leestoegang heeft tot de LDAP server." is a literal translation but lacks nuance. "Login gebruiker" is somewhat awkward in Dutch. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Geef de gebruikersnaam op die leesrechten heeft tot de LDAP server' or 'Geef een gebruikersnaam op met leesrechten voor de LDAP server'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Geef de gebruikersnaam op die leesrechten heeft tot de LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Określ użytkownika loginu, który ma uprawnienia dostępu do odczytu serwera LDAP" is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Please specify Login user who has LDAP server read access rights.' The phrase 'użytkownika loginu' is redundant and awkward. 'Login user' is better translated as 'użytkownika do logowania' or simply 'użytkownika'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Określ użytkownika do logowania, który ma uprawnienia dostępu do odczytu serwera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'uprawnienia dostępu do odczytu' is a bit clunky. A more fluent translation would be 'uprawnienia do odczytu' or 'dostęp do odczytu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Określ użytkownika do logowania, który ma uprawnienia do odczytu serwera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the user's role in accessing the LDAP server.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, especifique o usuário de login com permissões de leitura no servidor LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Indicați nume de utilizator cu permisiuni de citire pentru serverul LDAP' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the nuance of the English sentence. It's a bit clunky and not how a native Romanian speaker would naturally phrase this instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vă rugăm să specificați utilizatorul care are drepturi de acces în citire pentru serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'LDAP server', which could be better translated to 'server LDAP' for consistency with Romanian word order.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vă rugăm să specificați utilizatorul care are drepturi de acces în citire pentru server LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Укажите логин пользователя, который имеет права доступа на чтение сервера LDAP' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow in Russian. The phrasing 'права доступа на чтение' is overly formal for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укажите логин пользователя с правами чтения LDAP-сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, hyphens in 'LDAP-сервера' can be omitted. While common in technical contexts, avoiding them makes it slightly more readable in general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укажите логин пользователя с правами чтения LDAP сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not a natural or accurate rendering of the English meaning. The English phrase 'Login user' is not well translated. 'Login user' refers to the user account used for logging in, which has LDAP read access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් පිවිසුමට LDAP සේවාදායකය කියවීමේ අයිතිය ඇති ගිණුමක් සඳහාවි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability.  'පරිශීලකයින් පිවිසුම් සඳහා' can be rephrased to sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් පිවිසීමට භාවිතා කරන ගිණුමක් LDAP සේවාදායකය කියවීමේ අයිතියක් ඇතිවිය යුතුය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zadajte prihlasovacie meno používateľa, ktorý má prístupové práva na čítanie zo servera LDAP' is a bit verbose and could be more concise. While technically correct, it doesn't capture the nuance of the English tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadajte používateľské meno s prístupom na čítanie zo servera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses a comma after 'používateľa' which might not be the most natural flow in this context. Removing the comma could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadajte prihlasovacie meno používateľa, ktorý má prístupové práva na čítanie zo servera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Določi uporabnika za prijavo, ki ima pravice za branje strežnika LDAP" is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it's not the most idiomatic way to phrase it in Slovenian. It emphasizes 'login user' which isn't the core message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izberite uporabnika s pravicami za branje LDAP strežnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical issue, the use of 'strežnika' is grammatically correct (genitive case), but slightly less common than 'strežnika' when referring to a server in this context. It might be perceived as overly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izberite uporabnika s pravicami za branje LDAP strežnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not entirely accurate. "Login user" is a bit awkward. It should be clearer about who needs the access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо наведите корисника за пријаву који има права за читање са LDAP сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky. A more natural flow would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо наведите корисника за пријаву који има права за читање са LDAP сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Molimo navedite korisnika za Prijavu koji ima prava pristupa za čitanje LDAP servera' is a bit awkward and doesn't flow naturally. 'Prijavu' seems unnecessary and 'prava pristupa za čitanje' is verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Molimo navedite korisnika za prijavu koji ima prava čitanja na LDAP serveru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses lowercase 'prijava' where 'Prijavu' in the English might imply a more important or formal designation. Although subtle, it could be adjusted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Molimo navedite korisnika za Prijavu koji ima prava čitanja na LDAP serveru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Turkish. "Login kullanıcısını" is not the most common or idiomatic way to refer to a login user in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfen LDAP sunucusunu okuma erişim yetkisine sahip kullanıcı adını belirtin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation uses a full stop at the end which is less common in tooltips. Consider omitting it for better consistency with other UI elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfen LDAP sunucusunu okuma erişim yetkisine sahip kullanıcı adını belirtin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Вкажіть логін користувача, який має права доступу для читання з сервера LDAP" is a literal translation but could be more natural and user-friendly. "Login" isn't the most common term in Ukrainian.  A more common phrasing would use 'ім'я користувача'.  The phrase 'права доступу для читання' is also a bit verbose; 'права на читання' is more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вкажіть ім'я користувача, який має права на читання з сервера LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but sounds unnatural and overly formal for a tooltip. "Đăng nhập" is redundant as it's already implied in the context. The phrase "có quyền truy cập đọc" can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xin hãy chỉ định người dùng có quyền đọc trên máy chủ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a single sentence. Tooltips often benefit from brevity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xin hãy chỉ định người dùng có quyền đọc LDAP.
